Package coreClasses

Class Player

java.lang.Object
coreClasses.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
Represents an Player object
Since:
2/4/2021
Version:
17/5/2021
Author:
Jordan Vegar and Hugo Phibbs

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String name, int startingCash)
      Constructor method for a player object
      Parameters:
      name - String for the player's name
      startingCash - int for the set amount of Pirate Bucks the player has at the start of the game.

  • Method Details

    • purchasedItemsToString

      public java.lang.String purchasedItemsToString()
      Method to convert a Player's purchased Items into a String representation Used for Command Line Only
      Returns:
      String representation of a Players purchased Items

    • purchasedItemsToArray

      public java.lang.String[][] purchasedItemsToArray()
      Converts purchased items of a Player into array format. returned String[][] array is in tabular format, so it can easily be used by GUI
      Returns:
      String[][] nested Array representation of the purchased items of a Player.

    • addPurchasedItem

      public void addPurchasedItem​(Item item)
      Adds an item the player has purchased to purchasedItems.
      Parameters:
      item - Item that the player has purchased.

    • spendMoney

      public boolean spendMoney​(int amountSpent)
      Checks the player has enough Pirate Bucks for a purchase, and if so, reduces there balance by that amount
      Parameters:
      amountSpent - int for the amount the purchase costs.
      Returns:
      boolean value if money was spent or not, ie player had enough cash to pay

    • moneyBalanceToString

      public java.lang.String moneyBalanceToString()
      Method to convert a Players money balance into a String representation
      Returns:
      String representation of a Player's money balance

    • earnMoney

      public void earnMoney​(int amountEarned)
      Increases the player's balance by the given amount
      Parameters:
      amountEarned - int for the amount of Pirate Bucks gained by the player.

    • setShip

      public void setShip​(Ship ship)
      Setter method for the Ship belonging to a Player
      Parameters:
      ship - Ship object to be set to belong to a Player

      public Ship getShip()
      Getter method for the Ship object belonging to a Player
      Returns:
      Ship object belonging to a Player

      Getter method for the name of a Player

      public int getMoneyBalance()
      Getter method for the current money balance of a Player
      Returns:
      int of the money balance of a player

    • getPurchasedItems

      public java.util.ArrayList<Item> getPurchasedItems()
      Getter method for the purchased items of a Player Both ones that have been bought and sold back to a store
      Returns:
      ArrayList containing the purchased Items of a player
